briefdescription.para: Variable to store the current page number.
Function to read data coming from the serial port. This function is design to handle the data from the display and process it accordingly.

detaileddescription.para:
The command received has the following format: code + data1 + data2.
The code is a single byte that identifies the command.
The data1 is a single byte that contains the value associated with the command.
The data2 is a single byte that contains additional information related to the command. Defaults to 0x00 if not used.
This function does not return any value.
Ernesto Estrada
June 6, 2025
1.0

briefdescription.para: Function that handles the data received from the Nextion display over the serial port.

detaileddescription.para:
code
The code that was received from the Nextion display, depends on the command sent
data1
The data received from the Nextion display, depends on the page number received
data2
The data received from the Nextion display, depends on the page number received. Defaults to 0x00 if not used.
This function does not return a value.
This function is used to handle the data received from the Nextion display and execute the corresponding features or commands based on the received data.
Ernesto Estrada
March 5, 2025
1.0
